meanings.sent1: The secretory gland releases hormones into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the secretory process of sweat production.
meanings.sent3: The secretory activity of the plant was so efficient that it amazed the botanist.
meanings.sent4: Her secretory abilities were like a well-oiled machine, always producing exactly what was needed.
meanings.sent5: The secretory function of the liver is crucial for maintaining balance in the body.

meanings.definition: Producing or capable of producing a secretion.
meanings.sent1: The secretory cells in the body play a vital role in digestion.
meanings.sent2: The snake's secretory system allows it to inject venom into its prey.
meanings.sent3: The secretory nature of the flower made it a favorite among bees.
meanings.sent4: Her secretory ability was like a hidden superpower, always ready to help in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The secretory function of the salivary glands helps in breaking down food during digestion.
